about.headline: About me
about.remote: I am open to work remote...
about.text: For me, code is like a toolbox - I love turning ideas into something tangible, piece by piece. What excites me most is combining design and functionality to create interfaces that feel light and enjoyable. With tools like React and Tailwind, I quickly find creative solutions, always aiming to build modern and intuitive user experiences.

skills.headline: My Skills
skills.learningBottom: I am always eager to learn and continuously improve my skills to keep up with the latest technologies and trends.

projects.headline: My Projects
projects.organized: How i have organized my work

pokedex.about: The app works like a mini Pokédex, giving you quick info on the first 151 Pokémon - from types and moves to fun little facts. With a simple search, you can instantly find any Pokémon and browse your collection anytime.
pokedex.organized: First, I planned the structure and design of the UI. Then, I organized the content from the PokéAPI into classes to keep everything clean and manageable. Finally, I brought the Pokédex to life by writing the code that makes it all work.
pokedex.learning: With this project, I first learned how to use classes to organize content. I also gained experience working with REST APIs through the PokéAPI.

game.about: El Pollo Loco is a fun jump'n'run game where you take on the role of Pepe Pellegrino, battling mischievous chickens and a mighty boss. To defeat his enemies, Pepe can jump skillfully and throw bottles — making the gameplay simple, yet entertaining.
game.organized: At the start, I designed the necessary classes and defined their structure to create a solid foundation for the project. After that, I integrated the objects into the game world and equipped them with the right functions - bringing the gameplay to life step by step.
game.learning: Developing this game gave me valuable insights into object-oriented programming and taught me the importance of clean, modular work for creating clear and scalable code structures.

join.about: Task manager inspired by the Kanban system, allowing you to create, organize, and prioritize tasks with drag-and-drop functionality. Assign users and categories to keep everything structured and manageable.
join.organized: For this Angular project, I first carefully planned the component structure and data flows to ensure a clear and reusable architecture. I also divided the task management into separate, modular components that can be easily extended or adjusted.
join.learning: During implementation, I gained valuable experience in modular development and working with state management. These skills helped me write clean, maintainable, and well-structured code, making the project more flexible.

team.headline: Need a teamplayer? Here what my colleagues said about me
team.reference1: Nils contributed actively to our app and offered clear ideas. His reliable and professional manner greatly supported our collaboration.
team.reference2: Nils has a quick grasp of things and has proven to be a very good partner within the team. He is also very capable and personable.
team.reference3: Nils demonstrated strong technical understanding and helped our team progress quickly. His open communication made working together very pleasant.

contact.headline: Contact Me
contact.paragraph: Looking for a dedicated frontend developer who does more than just write code? I combine clean, modern design with structured development. Let's connect - I'd love to learn more about your project.
contact.name: Your Name
contact.privacy2: and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.
contact.alertCheckbox: Please agree to the privacy policy!

SOURCE.TITLE: Legal text by Dr. Schwenke - click for more information.
SOURCE.TEXT: Created with the free Privacy Policy Generator by Dr. Thomas Schwenke

PROCESSING_OVERVIEW.TITLE: Overview of Processing Activities
PROCESSING_OVERVIEW.INTRO: The following overview summarizes the types of data processed, the purposes of processing, and the categories of data subjects.

DATA_TYPES.TITLE: Types of Data Processed
DATA_TYPES.CONTACT: Contact data (e.g. email addresses, phone numbers).
DATA_TYPES.CONTENT: Content data (e.g. text entries, photos, videos).
DATA_TYPES.USAGE: Usage data (e.g. visited websites, access times, IP addresses).
DATA_TYPES.META: Meta, communication and procedural data (e.g. log files).
DATA_TYPES.LOGS: Log data (e.g. server logs, error logs).

PURPOSES.TITLE: Purposes of Processing
PURPOSES.SERVICE: Provision of our online services and user-friendliness.

LEGAL_BASES.TITLE: Relevant Legal Bases
LEGAL_BASES.INTRO: Below we inform you of the legal bases of the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) on which we process personal data.

CONSENT.TITLE: Consent (Art. 6 para. 1 sentence 1 lit. a GDPR)
CONSENT.TEXT: The data subject has given consent to the processing of his or her personal data for one or more specific purposes.

CONTRACT.TITLE: Performance of a Contract and Pre-Contractual Inquiries (Art. 6 para. 1 sentence 1 lit. b GDPR)
CONTRACT.TEXT: Processing is necessary for the performance of a contract to which the data subject is party or in order to take steps at the request of the data subject prior to entering into a contract.

LEGAL_OBLIGATION.TITLE: Legal Obligation (Art. 6 para. 1 sentence 1 lit. c GDPR)
LEGAL_OBLIGATION.TEXT: Processing is necessary for compliance with a legal obligation to which the controller is subject.

LEGITIMATE_INTERESTS.TITLE: Legitimate Interests (Art. 6 para. 1 sentence 1 lit. f GDPR)
LEGITIMATE_INTERESTS.TEXT: Processing is necessary for the purposes of the legitimate interests pursued by the controller or by a third party, except where such interests are overridden by the interests or fundamental rights and freedoms of the data subject.

PROTECTION_INTERESTS.TITLE: Protection of Vital Interests (Art. 6 para. 1 sentence 1 lit. d GDPR)
PROTECTION_INTERESTS.TEXT: Processing is necessary in order to protect the vital interests of the data subject or of another natural person.

LEGAL_BASES.NOTICE: In addition to the provisions of the GDPR, national data protection regulations may apply.

SECURITY.TITLE: Security Measures
SECURITY.INTRO: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to ensure a level of security appropriate to the risk, in accordance with legal requirements.

MEASURES.ACCESS_CONTROL: Access control: Only authorized individuals have access to personal data.
MEASURES.ENCRYPTION: Encryption: Use of TLS/SSL and other encryption methods to protect data transmission.
MEASURES.BACKUP: Data backup: Regular backups to prevent data loss.
MEASURES.UPDATES: System and software updates: Continuous updates to close security vulnerabilities.
MEASURES.AWARENESS: Awareness: Training employees in data protection and information security.

SECURITY.TLS: Our website uses TLS encryption (visible by “https://” in the address bar) to protect the transmission of confidential information.

DATA_TRANSFER.TITLE: Transfer of Personal Data
DATA_TRANSFER.INTRO: In the course of processing personal data, it may happen that data is transmitted to or disclosed to other entities, companies, or persons.
DATA_TRANSFER.PROCESSORS: Transfers may occur to processors or third parties insofar as this is permitted by law.
DATA_TRANSFER.LEGAL_REQUIREMENTS: Data may be transmitted to fulfill legal obligations or official requirements.
DATA_TRANSFER.CONSENT: If a transfer is based on consent, it is carried out only within the scope of the stated purpose.
DATA_TRANSFER.LEGITIMATE_INTERESTS: If a transfer is based on legitimate interests, we inform you about this within this privacy policy.

INTL_TRANSFER.TITLE: Data Processing in Third Countries
INTL_TRANSFER.INTRO: A transfer of personal data to a third country (outside the EU or EEA) only takes place in accordance with legal requirements.
INTL_TRANSFER.ADEQUACY: The transfer is based on an adequacy decision of the European Commission.
INTL_TRANSFER.STANDARD_CLAUSES: If no such decision exists, the transfer is based on standard contractual clauses or comparable safeguards.
INTL_TRANSFER.EXCEPTIONS: In exceptional cases, the transfer may be based on the consent of the data subject or for the performance of a contract.
INTL_TRANSFER.NOTICE: Data subjects are informed about the respective legal basis and guarantees of the third-country transfer.

STORAGE_DELETION.TITLE: Storage Duration and Deletion of Data
STORAGE_DELETION.INTRO: We process and store personal data only for as long as necessary to fulfill the respective purposes or as required by law.
STORAGE_DELETION.PURPOSE: After the purpose of processing has ceased or legal retention periods have expired, data is deleted or restricted in processing.
STORAGE_DELETION.LEGAL_OBLIGATIONS: Longer storage may occur if required by law, e.g., under tax or commercial retention obligations.
STORAGE_DELETION.USER_REQUEST: Users may request deletion insofar as no legal retention obligations conflict with it.
STORAGE_DELETION.LOGS: Server log data is usually stored temporarily for security purposes and then deleted or anonymized.
STORAGE_DELETION.ADDITIONAL_INFO: Further details on storage periods can be found in the specific processing sections of this privacy policy.

RIGHTS.TITLE: Rights of Data Subjects
RIGHTS.INTRO: According to the GDPR, data subjects have various rights, in particular those defined in Articles 15 to 21 GDPR:
RIGHTS.OBJECTION: Right to Object: You have the right to object at any time, on grounds relating to your particular situation, to the processing of your personal data.
RIGHTS.WITHDRAWAL: Right to Withdraw Consent: You have the right to withdraw your consent at any time with effect for the future.
RIGHTS.ACCESS: Right of Access: You have the right to obtain confirmation as to whether or not personal data concerning you is being processed and to access such data.
RIGHTS.RECTIFICATION: Right to Rectification: You have the right to have incomplete or inaccurate data corrected.
RIGHTS.ERASURE: Right to Erasure: You have the right to request the deletion of your personal data unless legal retention obligations prevent this.
RIGHTS.PORTABILITY: Right to Data Portability: You have the right to receive your personal data in a structured, commonly used, and machine-readable format or to request its transfer to another controller.
RIGHTS.COMPLAINT: Right to Lodge a Complaint: You have the right to lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority if you believe that the processing of your personal data infringes data protection law.

WEBHOSTING.TITLE: Provision of Online Services and Web Hosting
WEBHOSTING.INTRO: We process user data to provide our online services. This includes processing IP addresses to deliver content to user devices.
WEBHOSTING.DATA_TYPES: Types of Data Processed: Usage data (e.g., page views, click paths, duration); meta, communication and procedural data (e.g., IP addresses, timestamps, identifiers).
WEBHOSTING.AFFECTED: Data Subjects: Users (e.g., website visitors, users of online services).
WEBHOSTING.PURPOSES: Purposes of Processing: Provision of online services, user experience, IT security, and technical infrastructure.
WEBHOSTING.RETENTION: Storage and Deletion: Deletion is carried out in accordance with the section 'Storage Duration and Deletion'.
WEBHOSTING.LEGAL_BASIS: Legal Basis: Legitimate Interests (Art. 6 (1) lit. f GDPR).
WEBHOSTING.ACCESS_LOGS: Collection of Access Data and Log Files: Access to our online offering is logged in so-called server log files. These include retrieved pages, timestamps, transferred data amounts, browser type, and IP address. Storage is for security and stability purposes and is deleted or anonymized after a maximum of 30 days.

COOKIES.TITLE: Use of Cookies and Similar Technologies
COOKIES.INTRO: We use cookies and similar technologies to ensure the functionality of our website, perform statistical analysis, and support marketing activities.
COOKIES.TYPES: Types of Data Processed: Usage data (e.g., pages visited, interaction times), device information (e.g., browser type, operating system).
COOKIES.ESSENTIAL: Essential Cookies: Required to ensure the basic functionality of the website (e.g., session management, security).
COOKIES.FUNCTIONAL: Functional Cookies: Serve to improve user experience and convenience (e.g., language settings, preference storage).
COOKIES.STATISTICS: Statistics Cookies: Collect anonymized data on website usage to optimize content and features.
COOKIES.MARKETING: Marketing and Tracking Cookies: Used to analyze user behavior across websites and display personalized advertising.
COOKIES.MANAGEMENT: Cookie Management: Users can configure their browser settings or use a consent tool to decide which cookies to allow or reject.

CONTACT.TITLE: Contact and Request Management
CONTACT.INTRO: When contacting us (e.g., via email, telephone, or contact form), the information provided by the inquiring persons is processed insofar as this is necessary to respond to the inquiry.
CONTACT.DATA_TYPES: Types of Data Processed: Inventory data (e.g., name, contact details), content data (e.g., message text), communication data (e.g., IP address, timestamp).
CONTACT.PURPOSES: Purposes of Processing: Responding to contact inquiries, communication, and management of requests.
CONTACT.RETENTION: Storage and Deletion: Data is deleted once it is no longer required to fulfill the request or legal retention periods have expired.
CONTACT.LEGAL_BASIS: Legal Bases: Art. 6 (1) lit. b GDPR (performance of a contract or pre-contractual measures), Art. 6 (1) lit. f GDPR (legitimate interest in efficient communication).
